___enumModule.description: Indicates whether or not to export an additional TypeScript module (not to be confused with Angular's @NgModule) for each enum model, exporting values as constants and providing the values() method. Setting to false will reduce the size of the generated code. Defaults to true.

___camelCase.description: Generates service methods in camelCase instead of PascalCase

___modelIndex.description: Indicates whether or not to generate the file which exports all models. Defaults to true.

___includeTags.description: When specified, filters the generated services, including only those corresponding to this list of tags.

___defaultTag.description: The assumed tag for operations that don't define any. Defaults to 'Api'

___prefix.description: A prefix to the generated global classes, such as `Configuration` and `Module`. Defaults to 'Api', so the default generated files are `ApiConfiguration` and `ApiModule`.

___serviceIndex.description: Indicates whether or not to generate the file which exports all services. Defaults to true.

___removeStaleFiles.description: Indicates whether or not to remove any files in the output folder that were not generated by ng-swagger-gen. Defaults to true.

___templates.description: Path to override the Mustache templates used to generate files.

___swagger.description:
The location of the swagger descriptor in JSON format.
May be either a local file or URL.

___ignoreUnusedModels.description: Indicates whether or not to ignore model files that are not referenced by any operation. Defaults to true.

___output.description: Where generated files will be written to. Defaults to 'src/app/api'.

___generateExamples.description: Indicates whether or not to generate the example files from the example sections of the models. Defaults to false.

___apiModule.description: Indicates whether or not to generate the Angular module which provides all services. Defaults to true.

___minParamsForContainer.description: Indicates the minimum number of parameters to wrap operation parameters in a container class. Defaults to 2.

___sortParams.description: How to sort operation parameters. Required always come first. For backwards compatibility, the default value is 'desc', but 'none' is recommended for new projects.

___excludeTags.description: When specified, filters the generated services, excluding any service corresponding to this list of tags.
